about_the_game:
For years, Kobardde has been the scene of various conflicts. You witnessed a lot of these conflicts in your youth. This situation in your country is one of the biggest reasons for your fondness for the concepts of justice and law. You have now concluded your long and successful career as a lawyer and are about to begin your first day of employment as a judge. You will examine dozens of realistic, complex, and carefully prepared case files, consult witnesses and try to make a decision. In your decision-making process, you will become familiar with the various factors in your country. The decisions you make will directly affect the lives of one or both parties to the case. The decisions you make over time can directly impact your life. What kind of a career as a judge will you pursue?


Your career as a judge is directly related to your past life. For this reason, the game starts with a story where you will make choices based on the events in your country and your life, from Richard's youth to the day he passed the judge's exam. Your preferences will be effective in your career as a judge. This is an excellent opportunity for you to shape your career.




Kobardde got a new order after many years. Your role as a judge in this order puts you in a powerful position. However, there may be parties that may feel uncomfortable with your position. Although your decisions ease your conscience, they may not be considered appropriate by various segments. There will be situations where you will have to choose how much to compromise your values when deciding. You must identify your friends and foes for a long career as a judge.




  • Feel like a real judge with carefully prepared case files of tens of thousands of words inspired by actual events.
  • Experience a unique courtroom experience with realistic scene designs and animations.
  • The choices you make will take you to different ends of the game, have the chance to experience each one.
  • Resolve case files prepared with bribery and many other unique mechanics.
  • See the direct impact of the decisions and choices you make on your judge career.
  • Take a historical journey with different period modes and experience the atmosphere of that date.
  • Take your experience to the next level with pre-litigation cinematics prepared for each case.

short_description: As a judge of the Kobardde court, solve complex cases inspired by actual events. Your decisions will directly affect people's (and perhaps yours) lives. You may have to make difficult decisions for your family, country, and life. What kind of judge will you be?
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
